pkgsearch: Search and Query CRAN R Packages

Source: R/pkgsearch-package.R
pkgsearch-package.Rd

Get/search CRAN metadata about packages by keyword, popularity, recent activity, package name and more. Uses the 'R-hub' search server, see <https://r-pkg.org> and the CRAN metadata database, that contains information about CRAN packages. Note that this is _not_ a CRAN project.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://github.com/r-hub/pkgsearch

  • https://r-hub.github.io/pkgsearch

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/r-hub/pkgsearch/issues
